title: vINA pustaka dhAriNImAshrayE
sahitya:
vINA pustaka dhAriNIm AshrayE vEgavAhinIm vANImAshrayE


anupallavi

 ENAnkayuta jaTAjUTa makuTAntAm EkAgra citta nidhyAtAm vidhikAntAm


caraNam   parAdyakhila shabda svarUpAvakAshAm paurNamI candrikAdhavaLa sankAshAm
karAravindAm kalyANadAm bhASAm kanaka campakadAma bhUSA vishEhAm 
nirantaram bhakta jihvAgra vAsAm nikhila prapanca sankOca vikAsAm 
narAdhamAnana vilOka shOkApahAm narahari hara guruguha pUjita vigrahAm
